vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ὑποπλέω,
sail under, τὴν Κύπρον, i.e. under the lee of C., [NT+1st c.AD+]:—passive, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__II sail underground, ἐς τὸν Τίβεριν δι᾽ [ὑπονόμων] [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to sail to the lee of, to move to the side that offers protection or shelter
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to sail to the lee of, to move to the side that offers protection or shelter
to sail under; to sail under, the lee, or, to the south of, an island, etc., Acts 27:4, 7*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: costear (en barco), navegar al abrigo (para protegerse del viento)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: đi thuyền dưới; đi dọc theo bờ biển. ὑπό (G5259) và πλέω (G4126)
